text: my name is sean kirk and i lead the
worldwide specialist organization
security team at aws so we have a global
team and uh our charter is to help
customers secure their cloud migrations
security is top of mind for our
customers right it's one of if not their
top priorities they're very familiar
with how to secure their existing data
centers on premise but they often have a
lot of questions about how to secure
their cloud environment what are the
analogs between the security controls i
have today and the security controls
that are inside aws it's our team's
responsibility to help customers
understand the differences between
on-prem security and cloud security and
help them understand the fact that cloud
security oftentimes is better than
on-premise security and then more
importantly to prove it i've been doing
security for 20 years in various
capacities and i've been at aws now for
38 months you know my decision to move
to aws was was largely driven by the
ability for aws to impact the world you
know when i'm doing interviews
candidates are asking us all the time
like why did you join aws the answer is
always the same because i believe this
place more than any other place on earth
has the ability to completely change the
landscape and it's changing quickly
[Music]
